summary.title: Threat Model for Project ERP - Core Finance: Cloud-Hosted Environments
summary.description: Threat modelling for the ERP - Core Finance project, with a specific focus on the Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations (F&O) Cloud-Hosted Environments (CHEs) used for extension (customisation) development and other non-Production scenarios.

diagrams.title: Main Data Flows
diagrams.description: Data flows that relate to F&O CHEs
